title: Yosemite National Park: Stock Available for Adoption
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Yosemite Horse & Mule Adoption     Stock Available for Adoption              Stock Available for Adoption       Please apply if you'd like to adopt an animal.   Â       Utah Utah is a 25-year-old sorrel thoroughbred cross. He stands about 16 hands tall. He was primarily utilized in a frontcountry setting, but is an all-round good trail horse and would be good with an intermediate-level rider. He is a bit arthritic in his hind end, which can make him difficult to shoe. Utah does set back on occasion when tied.
